Article Title: India vs New Zealand ODI 2026 squad announcement - All you need to know
Article Text:
Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma (AFP Photo)

India T20 World Cup squad: In search of ideal combination, Agarkar & Co. drop Shubman Gill

Ind vs NZ ODI 2026 squad announcement: All you need to know



New Zealand's ODI squad vs India

India vs New Zealand - Full ODI Schedule

Date Venue Time Sun, Jan 11, 2026 Vadodara, BCA Stadium, Kotambi 1:30 PM IST Wed, Jan 14, 2026 Rajkot, Niranjan Shah Stadium, Khandheri 1:30 PM IST Sun, Jan 18, 2026 Indore, Holkar Cricket Stadium 1:30 PM IST

India vs New Zealand - Full T20I Schedule

Date Venue Time Wed, Jan 21, 2026 Nagpur, Vidarbha Cricket Association Stadium 7:00 PM IST Fri, Jan 23, 2026 Raipur, Shaheed Veer Narayan Singh International Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sun, Jan 25, 2026 Guwahati, Barsapara Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Wed, Jan 28, 2026 Visakhapatnam, ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sat, Jan 31, 2026 Thiruvananthapuram, Greenfield International Stadium 7:00 PM IST

NEW DELHI: India are set to host New Zealand for a high-profile eight-match limited-overs series beginning on January 11. The tour will feature three One-Day Internationals and five Twenty20 Internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through January 31.The series comes at a crucial juncture, with several senior players returning to the ODI format and the T20 side looking to fine-tune combinations ahead of the ICC T20 World Cup 2026, which gets underway on February 7 in India and Sri Lanka.The ODI leg of the series is expected to draw significant attention, particularly with stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma making their anticipated return to the 50-over format after the South Africa series.Meanwhile, the T20Is will act as a final testing phase for Suryakumar Yadav-led Indian side as they prepare for their T20 World Cup title defence.While the BCCI has already announced the T20I squad for the New Zealand series, the ODI squad is yet to be named.The BCCI selection committee is likely to hold an online meeting around January 3 or 4 to finalise the ODI squad for the home series against New Zealand.New Zealand have already announced their T20I and ODI squads for India series.Michael Bracewell (C), Adi Ashok, Kristian Clarke, Josh Clarkson, Devon Conway, Zak Foulkes, Mitch Hay, Kyle Jamieson, Nick Kelly, Jayden Lennox, Daryl Mitchell, Henry Nicholls, Glenn Phillips, Michael Rae, Will Young: Suryakumar Yadav (C), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Rinku Singh, Jasprit Bumrah, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan Kishan: Mitchell Santner (C), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Jacob Duffy, Zak Foulkes, Matt Henry, Kyle Jamieson, Bevon Jacobs, Daryl Mitchell, James Neesham, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Tim Robinson, Ish Sodhi
Article Summary: India set to host new zealand for a high-profile limited-overs series beginning on january 11. The tour will feature three one-day internationals and five twenty20 internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through january 31.

Article Title: Gunnar Henderson and Katherine Bishop combined net worth: Inside the career earnings, salary and family life of the Baltimore Orioles star
Article Text:
Gunnar Henderson and Katherine Bishop (Image via: IG/X)

The net worth of Gunnar Henderson shaped by early MLB success

Katherine Bishop‚Äôs net worth and career beyond the spotlight

Gunnar Henderson and Katherine Bishop ‚Äôs combined net worth today





In an era that the Major League Baseball still is able to reward early performance, Gunnar Henderson has come out as one of the most valuable young talents in the league. Even at the beginning of his career, Henderson has already combined the top-tier on-field production with significant off-field achievements.Recently, he married longtime girlfriend Katherine Bishop which made his career a personal chapter marked by an incredibly fast track and cool. Their aggregate financial profile denotes more than contracts and bonuses. It emphasises the equilibrium between career growth and an anchored life which had been established long before the national prominence came.The personal net worth of Henderson is approximately 8 million dollars, which he has made mostly through his earnings in the Major League Baseball. He got a 2.3 million signing bonus upon signing with Baltimore Orioles in 2019 and it formed the financial basis of his career. His projected career income by the year 2026 is likely to reach to around 8.77 million dollars.In the last season, Henderson received a guaranteed minimum salary of 782 300 dollars. In addition to his regular contract, he has also enjoyed MLB pre-arbitration bonus pool, a system in the league that compensates good young players.His constant presence in the top of that pool is indicative of production and uniformity. Henderson is a long-term contract candidate and is widely regarded as the prospective long-term extension candidate with already attained accolades like AL Rookie of the Year and a Silver Slugger.The personal net worth of Katherine Bishop has not been publically revealed, partly because her career is not in the professional sports. As Henderson was becoming a player, Bishop was educating to be a pharmacist, creating a career based on stability and autonomy. She keeps her work fairly confidential, but it provides a source of financial strength independent of baseball cycles and financial reporting.The combined net worth of Gunnar Henderson and Katherine Bishop is estimated to be around 8 million dollars, mainly because of the earnings of Henderson in his early years of career. The couple has a good financial perspective as it starts married life in the company of teammates, family, and close friends. The figures are a part of a story that is being created, with Henderson still in his prime years ahead.
Article Summary: Gunnar henderson is one of the most valuable young talents in the major league baseball. He got a 2.3 million signing bonus upon signing with baltimore orioles in 2019. His projected career income by the year 2026 is likely to reach to around 8.77 million dollars.

Article Title: Sophie Cunningham‚Äôs best moments from 2025: Indiana Fever star shares major highlights in heartwarming appreciation post
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Sophie Cunningham gets candid as she reveals some of her best moments from 2025

Which teams has Sophie Cunningham been part of within the WNBA?

Also Read:





As the world welcomes the new year, athletes from within the WNBA shared their best moments from 2025. While Caitlin Clark was one of the first individuals from the league to do so, Sophie Cunningham followed quickly after. The most googled WNBA star shared her major highlights from the year in a heartwarming appreciation post. Sophie posted the reel with much gratitude towards whatever happened to her in the past year.Sophie joined the Indiana Fever in 2025. Ever since, she has been known as the enforcer within the team. She has shown strong allegiance towards her team, especially her teammate Caitlin. The WNBA star led the team to significant wins. Her off-court life has been quite happening as well, with photoshoots and brand endorsements. Let‚Äôs take a look at what the star athlete has shared, highlighting her memories from 2025.Sophie Cunningham‚Äôs post came up moments before the year was about to end. The post featured a joyful athlete showing off her new jersey after she joined the Indiana Fever. This was seemingly a core memory for the athlete, as it was the first one to be uploaded in the series.Following up were her moments with her friends, her zip-lining adventures, photoshoot moments and the athlete humming before a seemingly intense workout session, among others. While posting the memories, she wrote, ‚Äú2025, I love you ‚ú®Let‚Äôs have ourselves THE BEST year yet in 2026 yall ü§é‚ÄùHowever, these were just the beginning. One of the memories showcased the WNBA star in a funny situation where she failed to pronounce a word during a post-game interview. Sophie hilariously brushed it off to continue with her response. Her outfits have always been a highlight, and obviously, that could not have been missed in the series. Sophie shared some of her stunning outfits in the post. She even shared moments from their practice sessions. The Fever star was seen scoring a dunk from mid-court while addressing Caitlin. She said, ‚ÄúI got you, Caitlin,‚Äù and performed her victory dance right after. Sophie continued to show such skills within the court and led the team to secure significant wins. Such clips also got featured in the post.2025 was indeed a great year for the athlete. The athlete racked up some of the best brand endorsements throughout her career. She posted a picture of herself posing for Adidas. Sophie ended the appreciation post with a sweet family moment. It seemed like the perfect ending to a heartwarming throwback post.Sophie Cunningham joined the WNBA in 2019. She was drafted by the Phoenix Mercury as the 13th overall pick. Ever since she joined the league, Sophie has woven magic within the league. She has been with the Mercury for 5 years, from 2019 to 2024. In 2925, the athlete got traded to the Indiana Fever team. The same year, she led the team to become the NBA Commissioner‚Äôs Cup Champions.
Article Summary: Sophie cunningham joined the indiana fever in 2025. She has been known as the enforcer within the team. The wnba star led the team to significant wins. Her off-court life has been quite happening as well, with photoshoots and brand endorsements.

Article Title: Jaden Ivey‚Äôs return brings cautious optimism for the Detroit Pistons after long injury layoff
Article Text:
Jaden Ivey is a phenomenal player (Image via NBA)

Jaden Ivey flashes pre-injury form while easing back into Detroit‚Äôs rotation

Pistons prioritize patience as Jaden Ivey‚Äôs explosive spark returns off the bench





Jaden Ivey's journey back to full health has been gradual and challenging. For the Detroit Pistons, the return of shooting guard Jaden Ivey has presented an interesting scenario. After sustaining a fibula injury in January, the former first-round draft pick made his season debut in November. During a loose-ball scuffle, former Orlando Magic guard Cole Anthony lunged into Ivey's leg, ending his 2024‚Äì25 season at 30 games.The 23-year-old broke his left fibula at the end of the 2024‚Äì25 NBA season, which ended his season and caused knee pain over a year later. After undergoing arthroscopic surgery on his right knee in October of last year, he was able to return to the court in late November.Ivey was arguably playing the best basketball of his career before the accident. In his third season, he averaged a career-high 17.6 points per game and a remarkable 40.9% 3-point shooting percentage. His style seemed to match in well with All-Star Cade Cunningham, and his development was helping Detroit win basketball.Prior to the Pistons' victory over the Sacramento Kings, Bickerstaff directly addressed the strategy for Ivey."A plan in place for him to ramp up where he's comfortable, where he's confident, so that he can get back to playing the bulk minutes," he stated. Bickerstaff did not specify the plan's parameters or provide a deadline.Ivey is now coming off the bench for the Pistons after being activated for 17 games. He was only allowed to play for 15 minutes until he recovered enough to play on the court. Although his conditioning and game have improved, the return is still a work in progress.Thankfully, it appears that he is back on the court at last, albeit not entirely in the same manner that made him such a valuable contributor. In 17 games, he has averaged 8.4 points, 2.1 rebounds, and 1.8 assists per night while shooting 45.5% from the field and 39.6% from beyond the arc.Although his output isn't as high as it was during his three stints as a starter, he is still contributing to the Pistons' victories. The Pistons have only dropped six games since his return.It doesn't make much sense, at least not in the near future, even though Ivey would like to start again this season. The coaching staff does not want him to become exhausted and worsen his injury.Since returning to the squad this season, Ivey has averaged eight points per game. It's obvious that he's still trying to go back to his best and give the Pistons his all. It appears that head coach J.B. Bickerstaff is attempting to raise Ivey's workload following a cautious, slow start.Many other clubs in the league wish they could have the spark he brings off the bench. Before he returned to the court, Detroit was lacking in both speed and high-efficiency shooting. Head coach J.B. Bickerstaff said:‚ÄúHe looks good. You almost forget how fast and explosive he is.. His ability to explode from a stop to a start and get to full speed on his first step is remarkable.‚ÄùIvey's influence will be inconsistent due to his limited playing time, especially on nights when he plays for less than 20 minutes.Also read: Is Malik Beasley joining New York Knicks? Team to reportedly pursue Detroit Pistons shooting guard
Article Summary: Detroit pistons shooting guard jaden ivey returned to the court in november. The 23-year-old broke his left fibula at the end of the 2024‚Äì25 nba season. In 17 games, he has averaged 8.4 points, 2.1 rebounds, and 1.8 assists.

Article Title: "I love their hatred": George Kittle speaks out on Seahawks fans‚Äô animosity as 49ers rivalry reaches boiling point
Article Text:
George Kittle (Getty Images)

49ers vs Seahawks playoff picture intensifies rivalry spotlight







49ers vs Seahawks playoff picture sits at the center of the NFL‚Äôs most volatile weekend, and it defines the tension pouring into the season‚Äôs final chapter. With the margins thin and emotions loud, this rivalry arrives carrying more than records. It carries memory, noise, and consequence. Saturday night is not about comfort. It is about control, momentum, and who gets to shape January before it even begins.Pressure does not always come from the scoreboard. Sometimes it rises from the stands, the echoes of past battles, and the weight of what is at stake. As the regular season closes, San Francisco and Seattle meet with division pride and playoff positioning hanging in the balance. This is the kind of game that strips teams down to habits and nerve, where stars speak plainly because the stakes leave no room for polish.George Kittle did not soften his words when asked about Seattle‚Äôs fan culture. He embraced it. His comments reflected admiration wrapped in rivalry, the kind that fuels players rather than distracts them.‚ÄúSeattle is one of my favorite stadiums because they hate us and it‚Äôs always twice as loud as any other stadium I ever play in,‚Äù Kittle said to the press Thursday afternoon.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs just a great atmosphere, and I love their hatred for us, and hopefully the Faithful will bring it this weekend for them.‚ÄùThose words land differently because the setting has changed. The regular season finale shifts to Levi‚Äôs Stadium, but the noise will not feel local. Seattle fans travel well, and they know this game could decide the NFC West. The Seahawks arrive with a 13-3 record and a narrow lead that keeps the door closed, for now. San Francisco understands that one slip erases months of work.Their first meeting feels distant. Week 1 delivered a tight San Francisco win in Seattle, a defensive grind that hinted at how thin the margins would remain. Sixteen weeks later, everything is sharper. One game separates the 49ers from a division crown that would add another chapter to their legacy.This contest demands more than execution. It demands ownership of the moment. The 49ers must protect their home field from both a rival roster and a rival crowd. If they fail, the playoff picture shifts instantly, and control slips away just as quickly.Also Read: Micah Parsons‚Äô first reaction to Trevon Diggs joining Packers keeps Cowboys reunion hopes alive for 2026
Article Summary: 49ers vs seahawks playoff picture intensifies rivalry spotlight. San francisco and seattle meet with division pride and playoff positioning hanging in the balance. Saturday night is not about comfort. It is about control, momentum, and who gets to shape january before it even begins.

Article Title: Bruno Fernandes vs Martin √òdegaard: 2025-26 Premier League salary comparison, contract details, net worth, and more
Article Text:
Premier League captains Bruno Fernandes and Martin √òdegaard are top midfielders, commanding significant salaries and fan bases. Fernandes, older and with a longer global profile, boasts a higher net worth and lucrative endorsements. √òdegaard, though earning less, has performance-based incentives in his deal. Both are among England's highest-paid midfielders.

Bruno Fernandes vs. Martin √òdegaard: Financial differences

Earnings hierarchy

Casemiro (Manchester United): ¬£350,000/week (~$470,000 Bruno Fernandes (Manchester United): ¬£300,000/week (~$400,000) Bernardo Silva (Manchester City): ¬£300,000/week (~$400,000) Kai Havertz (Arsenal): ¬£280,000/week (~$370,000) Martin √òdegaard / Declan Rice (Arsenal): ¬£240,000/week (~$320,000)





Bruno Fernandes and Martin √òdegaard are two names that are ruling the Premier League midfield. They both serve as captains for their teams - Manchester United for Fernandes and Arsenal for √òdegaard. And both have a strong fanbase when it comes to their talent and charisma both on and off the field. To understand where these two sit in the hierarchy of Premier League superstars, let's compare these two defining creative forces of this era.At 31, Bruno Fernandes is in the "prime veteran" stage of his career, allowing him to negotiate a higher base salary during his 2024 renewal. Martin √òdegaard, being 27, is on a high-value long-term deal signed in late 2023. While √òdegaard‚Äôs earning is lower, his contract has multiple add-ons with heavier incentives related to Arsenal‚Äôs recent title charges and Champions League qualification.Bruno Fernandes holds a slight edge in net worth due to his longer career span at the top of the global game and his status as a national icon for Portugal, alongside Cristiano Ronaldo. This has granted him access to lucrative global endorsements, like Nike and Gillette, that Martin √òdegaard is only now beginning to match. With his international profile with the Norway national team growing, the latter is making up for the late entry to the game.Bruno Fernandes is known for a conservative but high-value property portfolio in Lisbon, Manchester, and the Algarve. His investments are geared toward post-career stability in mind. √òdegaard, on the other hand, has focused heavily on tech investments and sports startups in Scandinavia, reflecting a younger generation‚Äôs approach to wealth management.In the current 2025/26 landscape, Bruno Fernandes and Martin √òdegaard remain two of the highest-paid midfielders in England. Here is how the top bracket looks:Both midfielders try to bring their best game in every match, and are two of the biggest names in the current English Premier League. Fernandes's net worth at current is around ¬£50 million (~$63.5 million), while √òdegaard has accumulated a fortune worth of ¬£20-25 million (~$25 - $35 million).Also Read: Bruno Fernandes and Ana Pinho Combined Net Worth in 2025: Manchester United career, salary, investments and more
Article Summary: Premier league captains bruno fernandes and martin √∏degaard are top midfielders, commanding significant salaries and fan bases. Fernandes, older and with a longer global profile, boasts a higher net worth and lucrative endorsements. √ò degaard, though earning less, has performance-based incentives in his deal.

Article Title: Joseph Parker and Andy Lee combined net worth in 2025: Boxing earnings, investments, career success, lifestyle, and more
Article Text:
Joseph Parker and Andy Lee (Image Source: Getty)

Joseph Parker's boxing career, salary, and investments

Andy Lee‚Äôs investments, career, and net worth of the boxer-coach duo





Joseph Parker and Andy Lee represent a boxing victory that still attracts fans. Wise investments and brand deals are also factors of their financial trajectory apart from boxing careers. The former WBO heavyweight champion, Parker, still brings in millions from fights and endorsements while the retired WBO middleweight champion, Lee, maintains his fortune through coaching, commentary, and making good financial choices.Joseph Parker has made a property investment and lives a nice lifestyle in New Zealand, where he manages family life and boxing training at the same time. Lee‚Äôs living comparatively and modestly is still an ongoing process that comes from Parker‚Äôs competition with him, and that is the reason he can still mentor others.Parker‚Äôs comeback victories over Deontay Wilder and Zhilei Zhang have also increased his fight purses. The reports say that he gets $1.5 million for each fight. Parker's financial status is probably to be significantly enhanced, though, as Wardley and Dubois are going to create difficult fights, earning him more money apart from his fight purses.Apart from this, he gets a cut from the pay-per-view revenues besides his fight purses and has endorsement contracts that steadily reinforce his position as one of the richest heavyweight boxers in this era.His sponsorships and public appearances are also contributing to his financial security. It is very easy to approach him, and he also keeps it simple. Parker is sometimes overtly issues his Samoan background and connections to the community.Lee‚Äôs career highlights are winning the WBO title in 2014 against Matt Korobov plus a record of 35 wins, 24 by knockout. After retiring, he began to coach and do television commentary, training boxers like Tyson Fury and participating in the boxing world, which still earns him money. Lee focuses on the coaching and commentary side of the sport, thus making sure that the income after retirement is not so unstable.Parker and Lee together will have a combined net worth of $25-$37 million in 2025, which proves that their relevance in the boxing world as well as in other fields has been continuous and strong.Also Read: Joseph parker net worth in 2025: Boxing career, earnings, endorsements, lifestyle and more
Article Summary: Former wbo heavyweight champion, parker, still brings in millions from fights and endorsements. The retired wbo middleweight champion, lee, maintains his fortune through coaching, commentary, and making good financial choices. Lee's living comparatively and modestly is still an ongoing process that comes from parker‚Äôs competition with him.

Article Title: NBA‚Äôs biggest injuries in 2025: Tyrese Haliburton, Nikola Jokic, and more
Article Text:
Tyrese Haliburton #0 of the Indiana Pacers sustains an injury during the first quarter against the Oklahoma City Thunder in Game Seven of the 2025 NBA Finals at Paycom Center on June 22, 2025 in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.(Photo by Justin Ford/Getty Images)

1. Tyrese Haliburton face Achilles heartbreak



2. Nikola Jokic‚Äôs knee hypertension

3. Ja Morant‚Äôs constant ankle trouble



4. 4. Kyrie Irving goes ‚ÄúOut‚Äù



5. Fred VanVleet injury troubles







With the NBA‚Äôs expansion, every game demands more from players on the hardwood. From fancier dunks to ‚Äúswish‚Äù threes, the league‚Äôs requirement from its stars is at an all-time high. The sport of basketball is one of the world‚Äôs fastest in the world, and along with its breakneck speed, it is physically taxing on the players. The constant matches with no time to rest and reenergize have increased the risks of injuries.With 2025 ending, a lot of injuries were reported that reshaped the championship landscape in the NBA.From heartbreaking Achilles tears in the Finals to the ongoing maintenance of the league's most dominant big men, health has become the ultimate X-factor for the 2025-26 season.After leading the Indiana Pacers to a historic Game 7 in the NBA Finals, Tyrese Haliburton suffered a torn Achilles tendon in the summer of 2025 that has sidelined him for this entire season. With their star player injured, the Indiana Pacers were forced into a development and survival mode, leaning heavily on Bennedict Mathurin while their title window stays frustratingly closed for a year.Nuggets announced on 30th December 2025, that the MVP contender is out for at least four weeks after suffering a left knee hyperextension in a matchup against Miami.For the Denver Nuggets, Jokiƒá isn't just a player, he is their core system, and his absence puts immense pressure on Jamal Murray and Aaron Gordon on the offensive side. With the Western Conference filled with heavyweights, this 4-week stretch turns the tables for the worse.The dunking star suffered an ankle sprain back in October and then another ankle sprain in December. These repetitive injuries could potentially become a stumbling block for the Grizzlies during the playoffs. Memphis remains a contender only when Morant is on the floor, and this constant uncertainty gives a shaky foundation for their championship dream.The Dallas Mavericks have spent most of 2025 trying to fill in the gap left by their superstar point guard, Kyrie Irving, who sustained a torn left ACL in early March against the Kings. Irving‚Äôs injury abruptly ended his 2024-25 campaign and forced the Mavericks into a difficult spot. Despite the arrival of Anthony Davis and the rookie sensation Cooper Flagg, the team has struggled in clutch situations without Irving‚Äôs elite shot-making.With Kevin Durant's addition to the team, Rockets are currently Houston to a top-four standing. But without their key two-way player, Fred VanVleet, who suffered an ACL injury in September, the Rockets are missing their vital component. VanVleet‚Äôs influence on the team‚Äôs culture is commendable, and his loss was a significant hit to the team. The 2019 NBA champion‚Äôs absence forces young stars like Amen Thompson into high-pressure roles.Also read: Is Nikola Jokic‚Äôs NBA MVP bid slipping away as knee injury lingers for Denver Nuggets star?
Article Summary: With 2025 ending, a lot of injuries were reported that reshaped the championship landscape in the nba. Tyrese haliburton suffered a torn achilles tendon in the summer of 2025 that has sidelined him for this entire season. Dallas mavericks have spent most of 2025 trying to fill in the gap left by their superstar point guard, kyrie irving, who sustained a torn left acl.

Article Title: Five documentaries you should watch if you love NBA
Article Text:
Allen Iverson (Photo by: Doug Pensinger/Getty Images)

1. Hoop Dreams



2. The Last Dance



3. The Redeem Team



4. Winning Time: Reggie Miller vs. The New York Knicks



5. Allen Iv3rson







There is something incredibly about documentaries as they brilliantly capture the raw emotions and do justice to the intensity behind them. Basketball as a sport is just not about rings and championships, it is about every single drop of sweat that made a player‚Äôs dream of becoming a champion real. Documentaries will not give the audience a polished version rather, they will show all: tears, mental breakdowns, locker room drama, and the unbreakable mentality.These five documentaries remind everyone what it took to sit in the ultimate champion seat and what made one a fan of this very sport.Release Date: October 14, 1994 | Director: Steve JamesWidely considered the greatest sports documentary ever made, Hoop Dreams follows two Chicago teenagers, William Gates and Arthur Agee, for five years as they chase the elusive dream of the NBA. It‚Äôs not just about basketball, it‚Äôs a moving look at race, class, and the weight of expectation.Release Date: April 19, 2020 | Studio: ESPN / NetflixThis ten-part miniseries is the definitive account of Michael Jordan‚Äôs final championship season with the 1997-98 Chicago Bulls. With never-before-seen footage, it offers a revealing, sometimes uncomfortable look at Jordan‚Äôs legendary competitiveness and the internal politics of a dynasty.Release Date: October 7, 2022 | Studio: NetflixThis documentary is about the 2008 USA men‚Äôs Olympic basketball team, who, after a humiliating loss in 2004, were in search of reclaiming their gold medal. This film is a cultural reset as it shows the ‚Äúwin at any cost‚Äù mentality. The 2008 team was led by Kobe Bryant, LeBron James, and Dwyane Wade, who, through their discipline and teamwork, restored America‚Äôs pride on the global stage.Release Date: March 14, 2010 | Director: Dan KloresFew things are more entertaining than a great rivalry. This documentary captures the mid-'90s feud between the Indiana Pacers and the Knicks, highlighting Reggie Miller‚Äôs role as the ultimate "villain" in Madison Square Garden.Release Date: October 23, 2025 | Studio: Prime VideoAllen Iverson‚Äôs impact in NBA is non-negotiable. He not only redefined his playing position but also took the tunnel fashion to the next level. Produced by Stephen Curry and Shaq, Allen Iv3rson is a three-part docuseries exploring the life is AI or The Answer, a nickname that he famously got for being the solution to the 76ers' struggles. This film also focuses on Iverson‚Äôs original style, which was born out of mixing hip-hop and streetball, and how he revolutionized the basketball culture.Also read: Five Basketball movies you shouldn‚Äôt miss
Article Summary: Hoop dreams follows two chicago teenagers, william gates and arthur agee, for five years as they chase the elusive dream of the nba. Winning time: reggie miller vs. the new york knicks highlights the mid-'90s feud between the indiana pacers and the knicks.

Article Title: Could Sunday against the Las Vegas Raiders be Travis Kelce‚Äôs last game? Chiefs tight end is now the winningest player in franchise history
Article Text:
Travis Kelce‚Äôs final game could close historic Chiefs career.Image via: Getty

Travis Kelce‚Äôs Chiefs career defined by wins, not personal milestones







If Sunday ends up being the final game of Travis Kelce ‚Äôs career, it will close a chapter that is hard to match in NFL history. Kelce would walk away with some of the most impressive postseason numbers the league has ever seen, especially when it comes to winning when it matters most.Kelce owns 178 playoff receptions, which is 27 more than Jerry Rice, and his 35 Super Bowl catches rank first all time. Still, records have never been the thing that motivated him. Throughout his career, Kelce has made it clear that team success always came before personal milestones.That mindset showed up clearly two seasons ago. Kelce entered the final regular-season game needing just 16 receiving yards to reach his eighth straight 1,000-yard season. Only six players in NFL history have managed that kind of streak. But with the Kansas City Chiefs already locked into the playoffs, Kelce sat out to rest. The record did not happen, but Kansas City went on to win its third Super Bowl in five years.There is one achievement Kelce will finish this season with no matter what happens Sunday against the Las Vegas Raiders. He is now the winningest player in Chiefs history. His career record stands at 136 wins and 55 losses.Kelce‚Äôs journey with the Chiefs began in 2013, when he played just one special teams snap in a win. Over time, he became one of the most important players the franchise has ever had. He now sits ahead of Hall of Fame guard Will Shields, who finished his Chiefs career at 131-93. Long snapper James Winchester follows with 129 wins, while former punter Dustin Colquitt recorded 125.Several things helped shape this era. The NFL moved to a 17-game schedule in 2021, but the bigger reason is the consistent success Kansas City has had since head coach Andy Reid and Kelce arrived in 2013. Kelce‚Äôs 11 Pro Bowl seasons line up closely with the team‚Äôs most dominant stretch.The playoff numbers tell the same story. In postseason games where Kelce and Winchester played, the Chiefs went 18-7. Only four players in NFL history have appeared in more playoff wins: Tom Brady, Adam Vinatieri, Stephen Gostkowski, and Bill Romanowski.Sunday‚Äôs game also brings other storylines. Cornerback Nohl Williams has taken on a bigger role late in the season. Raiders rookie running back Ashton Jeanty is chasing a franchise record. And on special teams, punter Matt Araiza has had a strong year.Also read: Travis Kelce won't be back with the Kansas City Chiefs? NFL star Rob Gronkowski offers blunt take on what the tight end's next move could be
Article Summary: Travis kelce is now the winningest player in kansas city chiefs history. His career record stands at 136 wins and 55 losses. Kelce owns 178 playoff receptions, which is 27 more than jerry rice. His 35 super bowl catches rank first all time.

Article Title: Cam Newton makes a bold MVP case for Myles Garrett as quarterback favorites dominate the conversation
Article Text:
Cam Newton (via Getty Images)

Why Cam Newton believes defensive dominance still defines true value

MYLES GARRETT FOR NFL MVP?! üòØ Cam Newton SPARKS DEBATE by making the case üó£Ô∏è | First Take





The NFL MVP conversation is reaching its loudest point as the final week of the regular season approaches. Most years, the award felt decided before ballots are cast, with certain quarterbacks dominating both the discussion and the voting. This season has followed a similar path, with Matthew Stafford and Drake Maye taking turns as the favorite.Their performances, wins, and highlight moments have fueled the buzz among fans and voters. Still, former league MVP Cam Newton believes the race is being framed too narrowly. In his view, a player‚Äôs value is not only about touchdowns or team records but about how one player can bend an entire game plan without ever touching the ball. Newton is putting his bets on Myles Garrett for the prestige title.Appearing on First Take, Newton made it clear that Myles Garrett‚Äôs impact goes far beyond the box score. He said, ‚ÄúYou don't see people game-planning Drake Maye, respectfully, not even Matthew Stafford as much as they game-plan against Myles Garrett‚Ä¶If we're talking about most valuable player, (Garrett) has shown that he is the most valuable player.‚ÄùGarrett‚Äôs numbers back up Newton‚Äôs solid argument. The Browns star has piled up 22 sacks and sits just half a sack away from tying the single-season record shared by Michael Strahan and T.J. Watt. At age 30, and on a massive $160 million contract, Garrett is delivering elite production while anchoring a defense that keeps Cleveland competitive every week.Newton also drew a historical parallel to reinforce his case, saying, ‚ÄúWho does Myles Garrett remind us of? (New York Giants legend) Lawrence Taylor. Taylor won the MVP in 1986 with 20.5 sacks.‚Äù Still, the reality of modern MVP voting favors quarterbacks. Stafford briefly held the inside track, but Drake Maye‚Äôs five-touchdown performance against the Jets shifted momentum.The Patriots sit at 13-3, have secured the AFC East, and Maye now leads betting odds at minus 400, giving him an estimated 80 percent chance to win the award. Even if Garrett falls short in MVP voting, his season remains historic.Also read: Cam Newton says he gets ‚Äúno Brady deal‚Äù while discussing racial pay gaps in NFL media
Article Summary: The nfl mvp conversation is reaching its loudest point as the final week of the regular season approaches. Matthew stafford briefly held the inside track, but drake maye‚Äôs five-touchdown performance against the jets shifted momentum. Newton is putting his bets on myles garrett for the prestige title.

Article Title: Arch Manning Passes on 2026 NFL Draft as Texas QB Bets on Longhorns Return
Article Text:
Image via IMAGN

A season of lessons shapes the decision

Steve Sarkisian on Arch Manning

Steve Sarkisian, Arch Manning & TyAnthony Smith: Postgame Press Conference | Citrus Bowl | Texas

NIL value holds firm amid NFL delay

Also Read:





Arch Manning has made a defining call early in his college career, opting to pass on the 2026 NFL Draft and return to the Texas Longhorns for another season in Austin. The decision signals a long-term bet on development over draft-day hype for one of college football‚Äôs most scrutinised young quarterbacks.Manning entered the 2025 season surrounded by enormous expectations. Many projected him as a future No. 1 overall pick, while Texas was tipped as a national title contender. Reality proved more complex. Early inconsistencies and pressure behind a leaky offensive line stalled momentum, and his draft stock cooled as the season progressed.Still, the redshirt sophomore closed the year strongly, showing poise, sharper footwork and improved decision-making down the stretch.‚ÄúI felt like I developed a lot this year, especially towards the back half, and I want to keep it going,‚Äù Manning said. ‚ÄúThere is no reason to leave. I‚Äôve got a lot more football left to play.‚ÄùHead coach Steve Sarkisian has publicly backed the move, calling it a mature step that could pay dividends long-term. Sarkisian believes Manning‚Äôs development has gone beyond the stat sheet, pointing to improved command at the line of scrimmage and greater comfort handling in-game adversity.From a numbers perspective, Manning‚Äôs season was solid if not spectacular. He threw for nearly 3,000 yards, accounted for over 30 total touchdowns, and led Texas to a double-digit win campaign capped by a bowl victory. However, seven interceptions and early-season struggles highlighted why another collegiate year could be valuable before taking on the NFL spotlight.The decision also carries financial and branding implications. Manning remains one of college football‚Äôs most valuable NIL athletes, even after his valuation dipped slightly during the season. With endorsement deals spanning national brands and his surname still carrying weight, another year in college does little to hurt his earning power and may enhance it if his on-field play takes a leap.From an NFL perspective, scouts remain intrigued. Several evaluators have noted that Manning still possesses franchise-quarterback traits size, arm strength, and composure even if refinement is needed. Early projections already place him firmly in the conversation for the 2027 NFL Draft, provided his upward trajectory continues.For now, Arch Manning‚Äôs message is clear. This is not a retreat from the NFL dream, but a recalibration. By betting on another year in burnt orange, he is betting on growth, patience, and the belief that the best version of his game is still to come.
Article Summary: Arch manning will return to the texas longhorns for another season in austin. The decision signals a long-term bet on development over draft-day hype. Head coach steve sarkisian has publicly backed the move. Manning remains one of college football‚Äôs most valuable nil athletes.

Article Title: ‚ÄòBe patient, you‚Äôre very close‚Äô: Why Carlie Irsay-Gordon now has to decide if Shane Steichen stays or goes
Article Text:
Carlie Irsay-Gordon has not discussed Shane Steichen‚Äôs job security yet, but after a historic Colts collapse, the decision is coming whether anyone says it out loud or not. (Image via Getty)

Bruce Arians says stay the course, even after a third straight playoff miss

Carlie Irsay-Gordon has not discussed job security yet, but history is working against Steichen





The Indianapolis Colts are officially out of the playoffs, and the fallout has already begun. After starting the season 8-2, Indianapolis became the first team since 1995 to miss the postseason following such a start. That collapse has put head coach Shane Steichen under real pressure as the franchise enters its first offseason under principal owner Carlie Irsay-Gordon.Steichen has now missed the playoffs in three straight seasons. Injuries explain part of the story, but not all of it. With the Colts eliminated and no job-security talks happening yet, Irsay-Gordon is facing her first defining football decision. Keep the coach and trust the process, or decide that close is no longer good enough.Former Colts offensive coordinator and interim head coach Bruce Arians does not believe Indianapolis should make a coaching change. Appearing on the Dec. 31 episode of ‚ÄúThe Pat McAfee Show,‚Äù Arians urged patience from ownership.‚ÄúI hope the Colts don‚Äôt make a change, because I think they‚Äôre close‚Ä¶be patient, you‚Äôre very, very close. Don‚Äôt let one or two injuries run you out of the whole damn thing,‚Äù Arians said.The argument starts with how the season opened. Indianapolis entered its bye week at 8-2 and looked like a legitimate AFC contender.ESPN‚Äôs Football Power Index once gave the Colts a 93.9% chance to make the playoffs and a 79.4% chance to win the AFC South. At that point, the franchise acted like a team chasing a Super Bowl, trading two first-round picks and a second-round receiver to acquire Sauce Gardner from the New York Jets.Then everything unraveled. Quarterback Daniel Jones suffered a ruptured Achilles in Week 14 against the Jacksonville Jaguars. Anthony Richardson Sr. was already on injured reserve with an eye injury. The Colts turned to a retired Philip Rivers, who lost all three of his starts. DeForest Buckner reinjured his neck. Gardner went down with a calf injury. Charvarius Ward suffered another concussion that ended his season.The Colts lost six straight games. Their season ended without a playoff berth for the fifth consecutive year.Steichen acknowledged the pattern after a Week 17 loss to the San Francisco 49ers.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs something I‚Äôve got to look at,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve got to find ways to win, especially in November and December. That‚Äôs where you win games and that‚Äôs where you make the playoffs.‚ÄùSteichen confirmed in Week 18 that he has not spoken with Irsay-Gordon about his future.‚ÄúI have not had those conversations with Carlie,‚Äù Steichen said. ‚ÄúBut I do meet with Carlie every week. We do a game debrief, go through the process of every game.‚ÄùThat working relationship is close. Irsay-Gordon is regularly present at practices, position meetings, and game debriefs. She meets weekly with Steichen and general manager Chris Ballard and was directly involved in major decisions, including the Gardner trade. She has also made it clear in the past that injuries matter when evaluating a season.‚ÄúDo you have a crystal ball?‚Äù Irsay-Gordon said earlier this year. ‚ÄúOf course, things happen and some of it is we all have to look at all these factors.‚ÄùStill, the results are hard to ignore. Steichen is now 25-25 across three seasons. Indianapolis has entered must-win games late in each of those seasons and failed every time. The Colts also hold a piece of unwanted history as the first team in 30 years to start 8-2 and miss the playoffs.This offseason is different. It is Irsay-Gordon‚Äôs first as principal owner following the death of her father, Jim Irsay, in May. Along with her sisters, she must decide whether to stay patient with a coach who has shown offensive upside but no postseason results, and a general manager who has one playoff win in nine seasons.The Colts are expected to consider re-signing Jones despite his injury. That plan, according to team sources, signals continuity. But continuity only works if the late-season failures stop.
Article Summary: The indianapolis colts are officially out of the playoffs, and the fallout has already begun. After starting the season 8-2, indianapolis became the first team since 1995 to miss the postseason following such a start. That collapse has put head coach shane steichen under real pressure.

Article Title: Joe Burrow comments on facing Myles Garrett as Browns star nears sack record
Article Text:
Image via USA Today Network

A familiar matchup with high stakes

Also Read:





As the NFL heads into a decisive Week 18, one individual milestone has quietly taken center stage alongside playoff scenarios. Cleveland Browns pass rusher Myles Garrett stands on the brink of history, just one sack away from breaking the NFL‚Äôs single-season sack record. Standing in his path is Cincinnati Bengals quarterback Joe Burrow , who addressed the situation with a calm, matter-of-fact response ahead of the divisional matchup.Garrett enters the final week of the regular season with 22 sacks, tying the mark set by Michael Strahan in 2001 and T.J. Watt in 2021. While records often bring added tension, Burrow made it clear that he is not planning to approach the game any differently because of the historic chase.Speaking to reporters this week, Burrow acknowledged Garrett‚Äôs dominance but dismissed any notion of overthinking the moment. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not going to go out of my way to stop him from getting the record, and I‚Äôm not going to go out of my way to let him get it either,‚Äù Burrow said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm just going to play football.‚ÄùBurrow is no stranger to Garrett‚Äôs disruptive presence. In fact, Garrett has sacked Burrow more than any other quarterback during his NFL career, a testament to the Browns defender‚Äôs impact within the AFC North.Cincinnati‚Äôs offensive line has struggled with consistency in recent seasons, making this matchup particularly challenging as Garrett lines up for what could be a defining moment in his career.Despite that history, Burrow framed the situation as part of the natural flow of the game. He noted that there are moments where taking a sack is simply the lesser of two evils, especially when weighed against the risk of a turnover or forced throw.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs such a situational game,‚Äù Burrow explained. ‚ÄúSometimes a sack is the best bad outcome. Other times, you get rid of the ball. You can‚Äôt go into it thinking about records.‚ÄùGarrett‚Äôs pursuit of the sack record has been one of the few bright spots in a difficult season for the Cleveland Browns, who enter Week 18 out of playoff contention. Even so, the edge rusher‚Äôs consistency and explosiveness have drawn praise from across the league, regardless of team success.For Burrow and the Cincinnati Bengals, the priority remains finishing the season on a strong note. While Garrett‚Äôs milestone looms large, Burrow‚Äôs comments underline a broader NFL reality: respect for greatness does not override competitive integrity.
Article Summary: Cleveland browns pass rusher myles garrett is just one sack away from breaking the nfl‚Äôs single-season sack record. Cincinnati bengals quarterback joe burrow addressed the situation with a calm, matter-of-fact response ahead of the divisional matchup.

Article Title: Claire Kittle explains the simple 2025 habit she refuses to leave behind in the new year
Article Text:
Claire Kittle explains the simple 2025 habit she refuses to leave behind in the new year (Image Via Getty)

Claire Kittle explains the 2025 resolution she is taking into 2026

‚ÄúThat uncomfortable fear zone is where you grow,‚Äù

‚ÄúWife‚Äôd Up & Mic‚Äôd Up,‚Äù





George Kittle‚Äôs wife Claire Kittle is stepping into 2026 with a clear mindset. In a recent interview, she spoke openly about one personal goal she started in 2025 and now plans to keep going. Her words came as she continues to grow her voice beyond the sidelines and into media and brand work.Claire Kittle shared her thoughts while speaking to People magazine in late December 2025, just days before the new year. The interview followed her partnership with Smirnoff‚Äôs ‚ÄúWe Do Game Days‚Äù campaign, where she talked about growth, fear, and learning to say yes.While speaking with People, Claire Kittle said her biggest goal has been learning to say yes more often. She explained that in 2025, she challenged herself to accept new chances instead of turning them down out of fear or comfort.‚ÄúI think I‚Äôve been doing a pretty good job of just trying to say yes to more opportunities,‚Äù Claire said. She added that she now feels confident in who she is and wants to see where those choices may lead her.Claire also shared that growth often starts with discomfort.she said, calling the idea simple but hard to follow.Claire first tried this mindset during the 2024 NFL season and carried it fully into 2025. As she heads into 2026, she plans to keep pushing herself in the same way.In 2025, Claire Kittle launched her digital serieswhich shows life behind the scenes for NFL partners. She worked closely with Kristin Juszczyk, wife of Kyle Juszczyk, to share real moments from game days and travel life.This season has also been strong for San Francisco 49ers. The team has won 12 games so far and is preparing to face the Seattle Seahawks.George Kittle missed one game after hurting his ankle in Week 16, but told ESPN‚Äôs Nick Wagoner that he is feeling ‚Äúgreat‚Äù and ready for the Saturday night Week 18 game.Claire recently shared an emotional Instagram post marking the final stadium of her journey watching George play across all NFL venues. She called the experience a dream and said the memories will last forever.Also Read: Joe Burrow Comments On Facing Myles Garrett As Browns Star Nears Sack Record
Article Summary: Claire kittle shared her thoughts while speaking to people magazine in late december 2025, just days before the new year. She explained that in 2025, she challenged herself to accept new chances instead of turning them down out of fear or comfort. As she heads into 2026, she plans to keep pushing herself in the same way.

Article Title: NHL Update: Maple Leafs captain Auston Matthews returns to lineup ahead of game against Winnipeg Jets
Article Text:
Auston Matthews will return to action after missing Tuesday‚Äôs win over the New Jersey Devils with a lower-body injury (Image Via Twitter)

Toronto Maple Leafs captain Auston Matthews will be seen playing against the Jets following his injury recovery

What is going on with Auston Matthews?

Also read:





Toronto Maple Leafs captain Auston Matthews will return to the lineup on Thursday, as the Leafs will lock horns against the last-place Winnipeg Jets in Toronto for a New Year‚Äôs Day clash. As per reports, Maple Leafs captain Auston Matthews will return to action after missing Tuesday‚Äôs win over the New Jersey Devils with a lower-body injury. This was confirmed by NHL analyst and expert Elliotte Friedman earlier today.Earlier, the Maple Leafs were without both Matthews and William Nylander in their 4-0 win over the Devils that closed 2025. This return is crucial for the team and their members, as the Leafs' captain is returning to open 2026 on Thursday against the Winnipeg Jets.As for their current standings, the Toronto Maple Leafs have last scored 18-15-6, four points out of the final playoff spot. Moreover, the 28-year-old was seen on Wednesday as they centred the top line between wingers Matthew Knies and Max Domi during Thursday‚Äôs morning skate.It‚Äôs indeed a new year for the Toronto Maple Leafs as their captain, Auston Matthews , will be seen playing against the Winnipeg Jets, following his injury recovery.He missed the recent game of Toronto due to a lower-body injury.According to reports, Matthews did not return after Sunday‚Äôs game against the Detroit Red Wings, following a block shot and a lower-body injury. However, he updated his injury status, adding that he ‚Äúfelt good‚Äù after Wednesday‚Äôs practice.He was initially listed as day-to-day before practice and sat out during Tuesday‚Äôs 4‚Äì0 win over the New Jersey Devils, with head coach Craig Berube calling his status uncertain ahead of Wednesday‚Äôs optional skate. However, Thursday‚Äôs morning session took a positive turn for Matthews, as he was seen skating with determination and looking generally agile alongside his teammates.While discussing his injury, Matthews added, ‚ÄúPretty worrisome. You never know what [the injury] could be. It caught me in a difficult spot and was pretty swollen for a few days.‚ÄùAs per the NHL, Matthews has 15 goals and 12 assists over 33 games this season with the Maple Leafs. But Matthews has not been as productive this season as the Maple Leafs. The game is a golden opportunity for the Maple Leafs to strengthen their position in the standings, and integrating Matthews will further bolster their offensive plans and may be, their winning streak as well.
Article Summary: Toronto maple leafs captain auston matthews will return to the lineup on thursday. He missed tuesday‚Äôs win over the new jersey devils with a lower-body injury. The 28-year-old was seen centred the top line between wingers matthew knies and max domi during thursday's morning skate.

Article Title: Pittsburgh Penguins and Sidney Crosby look to get back in form by defeating Detroit Red Wings
Article Text:
Sidney Crosy with Pittsburgh Penguins (Via Getty Images)

Pittsburgh Penguins looking to end their inconsistent run with win over Detroit

HISTORIC: Sidney Crosby passes Mario Lemieux for most points in Penguins history!

Detroit Red Wings looking to continue their impressive away record

Also Read:





The Pittsburgh Penguins welcome the Detroit Red Wings to PPG Paints Arena on Thursday night for their first meeting of the season. Pittsburgh enters the matchup with a 17-12-9 record and is coming off a dominant 5-1 victory over the Carolina Hurricanes.Detroit, meanwhile, arrives with an impressive 24-14-3 record and has been playing excellent hockey lately. The Penguins are looking to start the new year on a positive note after struggling through a 3-5-2 stretch over their last 10 games.Pittsburgh has been averaging 3.3 goals per game during that span but has also been giving up 3.8 goals, which explains some of their inconsistent results. Anthony Mantha provided the spark in the Penguins' most recent game with a two-goal performance against the Hurricanes.That kind of secondary scoring is exactly what Pittsburgh needs alongside the production from Sidney Crosby and the top line. Crosby continues to produce at an elite level with 21 goals and 19 assists this season.The captain shows no signs of slowing down and remains the driving force behind everything the Penguins do offensively. Bryan Rust has been hot lately with seven goals and six assists over the last 10 games.When Rust is scoring consistently, the Penguins become much more dangerous because it spreads out the offensive production beyond just relying on the top line.Pittsburgh has been solid at home with an 8-6-5 record at PPG Paints Arena. Playing in front of their home crowd should give them an advantage against a Detroit team that will be finishing a road trip.Detroit has been excellent over their last 10 games, posting a 7-3-0 record while averaging 2.8 goals and only giving up 2.3 goals per game. That defensive structure has been the foundation of their success.The Red Wings are particularly dangerous in close games, going 12-2-1 in contests decided by one goal. That clutch performance in tight situations shows a team that knows how to win when it matters most.Alex DeBrincat leads the Detroit Red Wings with 20 goals and 20 assists, providing the team with offensive firepower. Lucas Raymond has been facilitating lately with one goal and nine assists over the last 10 games, showing his playmaking ability.Detroit's 10-7-2 road record proves they can win away from home. The Red Wings won't be intimidated playing in Pittsburgh, and their recent form suggests this will be a competitive game. The Penguins are favored at home, but Detroit's strong play and ability to win close games make this a difficult matchup to predict
Article Summary: The pittsburgh penguins welcome the detroit red wings to ppg paints arena on thursday night. Pittsburgh enters the matchup with a 17-12-9 record and is coming off a dominant 5-1 victory over the carolina hurricanes. Detroit, meanwhile, arrives with an impressive 24-14-3 record and has been playing excellent hockey lately.

Article Title: Fans call it an ‚ÄúA+ wife move‚Äù as Ayesha Curry‚Äôs gesture toward Golden State Warriors star Stephen Curry explodes online
Article Text:
Ayesha Curry and Stephen Curry. Image via: Getty Images

NBA fans praise Ayesha Curry‚Äôs adorable gesture towards Stephen Curry





Stephen Curry‚Äôs wife, Ayesha Curry , made an explosive statement on her marital life that diverted heads. The Golden State Warriors‚Äô fans did not spare the International Smoke owner, as she was even subjected to backlash by the NBA star‚Äôs fans due to her comments on her marriage. However, both Stephen Curry and his wife, Ayesha, have never spoken about the ongoing rumors around their paradise.Amidst all this, Ayesha Curry‚Äôs recent gesture towards her husband, Stephen Curry, has won the hearts of his million fans on the internet. The Sweet July Skin owner was spotted wearing Stephen Curry‚Äôs Davidson jersey during his recent visit to the college. This simple and heartwarming gesture of Ayesha Curry has diverted the attention of NBA fans on social media.Stephen Curry‚Äôs rise to fame began during his time at Davidson College back in 2008. The two-time NBA MVP went on to become one of the most prominent scorers in school history while leading the Wildcats during the 2008 NCAA Tournament. Recently, the Warriors‚Äô star returned to his school along with his entrepreneur wife, Ayesha Curry.The popular three-point star was given a tribute by the Davidson school during his recent visit to his alma mater. However, instead of the NBA star, his wife, Ayesha, diverted heads with her heartwarming gesture towards him. She was spotted wearing Stephen Curry‚Äôs Davidson jersey during the felicitation program. NBA fans were blown over by this simple gesture of Ayesha and could not stop from commenting about it. A Stephen Curry fan mentioned,‚ÄúA+ wife move.‚ÄùWhile others praised Ayesha Curry for her loving gesture towards her NBA man.‚ÄúThat kind of support never goes out of style love seeing pride and loyalty come full circle like that,‚Äù a fan mentioned‚ÄúShe is definitely stunning üî•üî•,‚Äù said one fan.‚ÄúThat‚Äôs awesome! Ayesha is always supporting Steph‚Äôs roots in the best ways,‚Äù another fan wrote.Social media is buzzing with lovely comments from Stephen Curry‚Äôs fans on Ayesha‚Äôs sweet gesture towards her man. The mother of four clearly proved that the buzz around her marriage holds no weight and everything is great in the Curry‚Äôs paradise. The couple has been married for over a decade and share four adorable kids together. With Stephen Curry in the 17th year of his NBA career, he is a complete man, as when he is not busy representing the Golden State Warriors, he loves spending time with his beloved wife and kids. The Warriors' cornerstone is leading the respective NBA franchise with winning streaks and setting an example for the aspiring basketball athletes.Also Read: Ayesha Curry sends sweet 4-word reaction to Stephen Curry‚Äôs once-in-a-lifetime moon-shot billboard
Article Summary: Ayesha curry was spotted wearing stephen curry‚Äôs davidson jersey during his recent visit to his alma mater. Nba fans were blown over by this simple gesture of ayesha and could not stop from commenting about it. The couple has been married for over a decade and share four adorable kids together.

Article Title: WNBA injury report: When is Napheesa Collier back? Minnesota Lynx star‚Äôs tough start to 2026 amid major ankle surgery setback
Article Text:
Napheesa Collier is facing health issues (Image via WNBA)

What Napheesa Collier‚Äôs ankle surgery means for her return timeline and the Lynx?

Napheesa Collier‚Äôs historic season overshadowed by ankle setbacks and MVP heartbreak





Napheesa Collier is not having the best start to the new year. Napheesa Collier, a standout for the Minnesota Lynx, will miss the 2026 2017-18 season and might perhaps miss the beginning of the WNBA season. She co-founded the 3 versus. 3 offseason league with Breanna Stewart of the Liberty. This is because, according to the organization's announcement on Thursday morning, she will have surgery on both of her ankles and be out for four to six months.The Lynx's attempt to make a comeback to the WNBA Finals following their five-game loss to the Liberty in 2024 was likewise thwarted by the injuries. Collier was sidelined for three weeks after spraining her right ankle during a game against the Aces on August 2. In Game 3 of the WNBA semifinals against the Mercury in September, she tore three ligaments in her left ankle during the playoffs.According to ESPN, Dr. Martin O'Malley will perform the procedure in New York City sometime during the first week of January. The Lynx might start the 2026 season without their greatest player because the WNBA's season schedule hasn't been made public yet and it starts in May.Before finishing second to A'ja Wilson for the second consecutive season, the five-time All-Star suffered multiple ankle problems during the WNBA season, which exposed her as the overwhelming favorite for MVP.Collier will require surgery on both ankles, which is anticipated to keep her out of action for four to six months, according to a Thursday morning ESPN report. The WNBA All-Star is allegedly set to undergo the procedure in New York next week after consulting with her medical team.Collier wrote in an Instagram post:"I am heartbroken to share that I will miss this Unrivaled season," "I have fought hard over the last few months to be back with my [Lunar] Owls and was devastated to be told by my team of doctors that surgery was the best path forward. I will still be cheering on my teammates every step of the way, and I will continue to work relentlessly with the rest of the players and our staff to push our sport forward and raise the bar for women's basketball."The Lynx were defeated in four games and saw Phoenix secure their coveted berth in the Finals after starting the postseason as the top seed in the WNBA and outperforming every other team in practically every aspect of the regular season.Collier expressed optimism in her capacity to be well by the beginning of Unrivaled's second season during a virtual press conference in December.She stated that she was "still working to get back to 100 percent" by January and that surgery was not necessary. She made the decision just days before the Unrivalled season started on Monday, following consultations in Miami and Minnesota that concluded her recuperation ought to have advanced by now.During the 2025 WNBA season, Collier sustained many ankle ailments. She missed three weeks after suffering an ankle injury on August 2 during a 111-58 victory over the Las Vegas Aces. She ultimately missed 11 games, which affected the MVP contest. A'ja Wilson, a forward, won, while Collier came in second.With a 50% field goal percentage, 40% 3-point field goal percentage, and 90% free throw percentage, Collier concluded the regular season with an unprecedented 50-40-90 record. The only other WNBA player to accomplish the accomplishment is Elena Delle Donne.Temi Fagbenle, a forward with the Valkyries, will join the Lunar Owls in her place. Collier had a successful career year in the WNBA despite all of the injuries. She had a 40 percent shooting percentage from outside the arc and scored 22.9 points per game on 53 percent shooting from the field.Also read: Breanna Stewart vs Napheesa Collier: 2025-26 WNBA salary comparison, contract details, net worth and more
Article Summary: Napheesa collier will have surgery on both of her ankles and be out for four to six months. The minnesota lynx star was sidelined for three weeks after spraining her right ankle during a game against the aces on august 2. In game 3 of the wnba semifinals against the mercury in september, she tore three ligaments in her left ankle during the playoffs.

Article Title: Caitlin Clark names her favorite NFL player on New Heights amidst Super Bowl buzz
Article Text:
Caitlin Clark (Image via Getty)

Caitlin Clark is a huge Drake Maye fan



Caitlin Clark‚Äôs most-awaited recovery and return







With the Super Bowl almost a month away, everyone has their favorites, and so does WNBA‚Äôs biggest star, Caitlin Clark. On the recent episode of the ‚ÄúNew Heights‚Äù podcast hosted by the Kelce brothers, Jason and Travis, the 2024 ROTY winner appeared and sparked a cross-sport debate after naming her favorites for Super Bowl 2026.Though Clark hails from Iowa, she admitted her admiration for the New England Patriots, which is largely influenced by her liking for Patriots star QB Drake Maye. This seemed like a classic case where greatness recognizes and appreciates greatness.The last episode of New Heights for 2025 was anything but not dramatic. In a conversation with Jason and Travis over who is Clark‚Äôs favorite to win the next Super Bowl, Caitlin revealed, ‚ÄúI may not be cheering for anybody‚Ä¶but honestly, I am a Drake Maye fan. He‚Äôs been incredible.Continuing, she said, ‚ÄúI will probably be pulling for the Patriots, but the Rams are really good too. Sam Darnold seems like a good guy‚Ä¶I could root for him.‚ÄùDrake Maye and Caitlin Clark began their professional career in 2024 and have been proving to be a cornerstone for their teams. Draye Maye registered a completion rate of 66.6% completing 225-of-338 passes in 2024, over 2,276 yards, and 15 touchdowns.Clark also entered the 2025 season after a historic rookie campaign where she averaged 19.2 points and a league-leading 8.4 assists per game. Though her 2025 season ended early, just after 13 games, due to an injury, the snippets from the USA camp show Clark is healthier and ready to enter the 2026 season with a bang.While the Super Bowl occupies the current headline from who‚Äôll play to who‚Äôll perform at halftime, the Indy fever fans are more concerned with Clark‚Äôs physical longevity.Reports suggest her 100% recovery and her focus on strength training to return by the WNBA‚Äôs 2026 tip-off. Clark‚Äôs return is just not crucial for the Fever, whose offensive strength revolves around her, but also for the league as she‚Äôs a walking viewership magnet.
